name: No Time For Caution (itch) (Ahmed Naboot)
description:
Because I'm a fan of the movie " Interstellar" I worked on this game, where you play as cooper trying to save your ship "the ranger" by quickly locking to the big ship "the endurance". You only have one chance. Would you capture it? or let it slit??

your goal is to center yourself beneath the bigger shit BUT With the same moving speed, then lock your movement and start to rotate in the same rotation speed as the bigger ship, Then you can elevate your ship and win the game
